channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Holiday hotspot bows to protests and strips beaches of 1,700 sunbeds
item.description: Majorcan authorities are planning to remove 1,700 sunbeds from tourist-favourite beaches after pressure from local protestors.
item.author: Eleanor Burleigh

media:content.media:description: The Balearic Island welcomes thousands of British tourists every year

media:thumbnail.media:description: The Balearic Island welcomes thousands of British tourists every year

item.title: Canary Islands disaster as holiday hotspot plunged again into darkness after huge outage
item.description: A local leader branded the island as "not in the first world" following the second power outage in a month.
item.author: Alice Scarsi,Natalia Penza
item.media:keywords: Canary Islands, Spain, canary islands news, canary islands disaster, spain news, spain power outage,

media:content.media:description: La Palma is one of the islands part of the Canary archipelago

media:thumbnail.media:description: La Palma is one of the islands part of the Canary archipelago

item.title: School bus driver heard 'knocking' noise on France return – what he found was shocking
item.description: The illegal immigrants were found hiding in the wheel arches of the school bus after cheering and banging to celebrate entering England.
item.author: Eleanor Burleigh

media:content.media:description: The bus driver pulled over after hearing "banging and cheering"

media:thumbnail.media:description: The bus driver pulled over after hearing "banging and cheering"

item.title: Europe's migrant crisis continues as Spanish islands 'demand help' after 28 new arrivals
item.description: The arrivals are the latest in a rising number of unauthorised boat landings across Spain's Mediterranean coastline and islands.
item.author: Ciaran McGrath,Maria Ortega
item.media:keywords: Migrant Crisis, Algeria, Balearic Islands, Migrant crisis, Unaccompanied minors, Algeria-Balearics route

media:content.media:description: Maritime Rescue intercepts a boat in the Balearic Islands
media:content.media:credit: Government Delegation in the Balearic Islands

media:thumbnail.media:description: Maritime Rescue intercepts a boat in the Balearic Islands
media:thumbnail.media:credit: Government Delegation in the Balearic Islands

item.title: JD Vance throws huge strop threatening to deport man who said his 'pants were too short'
item.description: The eyebrow-raising spat was played on social media at a time when immigration is in the headlines, with riots erupting in Los Angeles earlier this week.
item.author: Ciaran McGrath
item.media:keywords: Immigration, Twitter, J. D. Vance, JD Vance, Derek Guy, deportation threat, social media controversy

media:content.media:description: JD Vance, pictured at CPAC, appeared to be wearing rather short trousers

media:thumbnail.media:description: JD Vance, pictured at CPAC, appeared to be wearing rather short trousers

item.title: Iran sparks fresh nuclear horror fears as Tehran 'turns province into militarised zone'
item.description: As nuclear talks falter, opposition group NCRI claims Iran has masked its warhead programme behind a fake satellite-launch programme.
item.author: Marco Giannangeli
item.media:keywords: Iran, Nuclear weapons, Iran nuclear programme, Kavir Plan, Ali Khamenei, International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA)

media:content.media:description: Iran has been lying about its nuclear development programme

media:thumbnail.media:description: Iran has been lying about its nuclear development programme

item.title: Donald Trump savages 'stupid people' as he seeks to jail US flag burners
item.description: Donald Trump on Tuesday claimed that without sending troops to Los Angeles, the city would be "burning to the ground".
item.author: Ciaran McGrath
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Military, Fort Bragg speech, US Army anniversary, Los Angeles troop deployment

media:content.media:description: Donald Trump addressing troops at Fort Bragg

media:thumbnail.media:description: Donald Trump addressing troops at Fort Bragg

item.title: Second UK tourist found dead in Albufeira after Greg Monks body found
item.description: The body of a British tourist has been found in the party resort of Albufeira, just days after a Scottish man was found dead in the same town.
item.author: Ruth Suter,Natalia Penza

media:content.media:description: The body of Greg Monks was discovered on Wednesday.

media:thumbnail.media:description: The body of Greg Monks was discovered on Wednesday.

item.title: Putin's puppet sends chilling WW3 threat to 'invade Paris and Berlin'
item.description: Solovyov, 62, is notorious for his strong nationalist views, vocal support for Putin's policies, and aggressive style of debate, including frequent threats aimed at the West.
item.author: Ciaran McGrath
item.media:keywords: Russia-Ukraine war, Protests, Vladimir Solovyov, Kremlin propaganda, Ukraine conflict, Donald Trump protests

media:content.media:description: Donald Trump was mocked by Vladimir Solovyov

media:thumbnail.media:description: Donald Trump was mocked by Vladimir Solovyov

item.title: Panic in Turkey as tourists abandon holiday hotspot – 'It's frightening'
item.description: A combination of natural disasters and spiralling costs has caused Turkey's tourism industry to take a "frightening" nosedive.
item.author: Eleanor Burleigh

media:content.media:description: Hotels in Turkey are recording their lowest level of demand since the COVID pandemic

media:thumbnail.media:description: Hotels in Turkey are recording their lowest level of demand since the COVID pandemic
